lg.l: Five a.m, just woke up, drank my coffee
Well I'll never go to work again
Too many cars with too many people
It's not for me this game
Earth is loosing its temper
Forests of unforgotten dreams
While the hanged-man is turning
I can see your face in between
Your starlight flies
Your starlight flies with a song
Has it ever been better?
Or was it just a state of mind
The united grace of unconsciousness
Plays with the Middle East on flames
Wars from hell knock on my window
And I can still be your best man
All the religions, all the insane
I can hear your voice through the remains
Your starlight flies
Your starlight flies with a song
And suddenly a stop -
